name: MagiCraft Balance - Best 3D 2048 with undo, replace, buy and daily puzzles.
name_original: MagiCraft Balance - Best 3D 2048 with undo, replace, buy and daily puzzles.
description:
The world is divided and YOU are guardian of balance...

Good, Creation, Life itself...
Evil, Destruction, Death...

YOU are apprentice tasked to perform simplest magic possible, extraction of essence from thin air.

However magic performed even in this lowest form still disturbs the BALANCE of mighty forces.

YOU should decide which side to come down to!

This fragile BALANCE is symbolized by the two serpents eating each other's tails.
If BALANCE is shifted too far one serpent will devour other and the circle of strength will be broken!

A network connection is also required.

FEATURES

● Millions of players do craft to establish global world balance.
● For hardcore and casual players.
● Next generation visuals on mobile.
● Well known gameplay with innovative twist!
● Funny and interesting Achievements.
● Daily and weekly challenges!
